item.title: HOME LAB PART 5: The Ultimate Small Form Factor Server for Home Lab
item.description: Today I’m going to share the result of my experience building my home lab, which, at least for now, I don’t plan to make any changes at least for a long time. As mentioned in my previous post as a spoiler, I shrank my setup even more and ended with a Mini ITX system bringing together two worlds: “/r/sffpc/” and “r/homelab/.” Also, as you may guess from the header, I moved my setup from an Intel processor to AMD, and this is also my first setup using AMD.
